There are no opposite-direction extrusions. Apply the scaling factor of 0.75 to the sketch. Height: 0.75 units Width: 0.4687 units Length: 0.75 units After completing these steps, you will have a three-dimensional rectangular prism as part 1. This part will have a flat top and bottom, and the sides will be parallel and meet at right angles. The part dimensions are 2 units by 3 units by 4 units in length, width, and height, respectively. This part is the base for further construction.</description>
